section.name: FIN_IPC_COD_TDOC
section.code: *<<<< FIN_VAL_IPC_COD_TDOC MOVE 'SGC' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'TFO' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE IPC-COD-TDOC IN IPC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS NOT = SPACES MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'COD EXI ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_DBC_IPC
section.code: *<<<< FIN_PUT_DBC_IPC MOVE DBC-GLS-NOMC IN DBC TO CPT-STRN. PERFORM CPT-BLKS. MOVE CPT-STRN TO DBC-GLS-NOMC IN IPC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_RPR_IPC
section.code: *BUS-TAB busca glosa de codigo en tabla IF RPR-IND-ESTA IN IPC-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'SGC' TO TAB-COD-SIST MOVE 'EST ' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB MOVE RPR-IND-ESTA IN IPC-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB PERFORM BUS-TAB MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-ESTA IN IPC-FLD ELSE MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ESTA IN IPC-FLD.

section.name: FIN_VAL_CON_KEY_IPC
section.code:
*<<<< FIN_VAL_CON_KEY_IPC IF DBC-NUM-ICLI IN IPC-FLD NOT > ZEROES AND IPC-IIC-IFOL IN IPC-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-KEY PERFORM FST-KEY-IPC.
IF IPC-COD-TDOC IN IPC-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-KEY MOVE 'S' TO FRM-UCUR MOVE -1 TO IPC-COD-TDOC-LEN IN IPC-FLD MOVE FRM-POS-CURS TO IPC-COD-TDOC-LEN IN IPC-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: INI_FST_KEY_IPC
section.code: *<<<< INI_FST_KEY_IPC MOVE -1 TO DBC-NUM-ICLI-LEN IN IPC-FLD. *>>>>
